title: A Deal or War? Crucial Talks to Begin Between U.S. and Iran
summary_full: President Trump has kept up a steady drumbeat of threats and built up U.S. troops in the region. Iran’s task is to give him a win but also preserve some semblance of nuclear enrichment.
summary_public: President Trump has kept up a steady drumbeat of threats and built up U.S. troops in the region. Iran’s task is to give him a win but also preserve some semblance of nuclear enrichment.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: preserve some semblance of nuclear enrichment
